PageTitle: reset ipv6 nd proxy packet statistics all
FuncDef: The reset ipv6 nd proxy packet statistics all command clears all the statistics about proxy ND.
CLIs: reset ipv6 nd proxy packet statistics all
Examples: <HUAWEI> reset ipv6 nd proxy packet statistics all
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To troubleshoot problems associated with proxy ND, run the reset ipv6 nd proxy packet statistics all command to view all the statistics about proxy ND.
